ios.emu.debug.build: export ENVFILE=.env.mock && xcodebuild ARCHS=x86_64 ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=no -workspace ios/ledgerlivemobile.xcworkspace -scheme ledgerlivemobile -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.emu.staging.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && export ENVFILE=.env.mock && xcodebuild ARCHS=x86_64 ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCH=no -workspace ios/ledgerlivemobile.xcworkspace -scheme ledgerlivemobile -configuration Staging -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

android.emu.debug.build: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.mock ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..

android.emu.staging.build: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.mock ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=stagingRelease && cd ..

android.att.debug.build: cd android && ENVFILE=.env.mock ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..
